import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Creates a new group within the specified organization."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/org/{orgid}/groups"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new group under the specified organizational path.  The request body must contain the complete group data. 

**Permissions:**
`Teacher, Admin, SuperAdmin`

**Events:**
`GROUP.CREATE [success, error]`

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgid","in":"path","description":"Unique identifier for the organization.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","description":"Authentication token for authorization.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Details required for creating a new group.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["enddate","startdate","title"],"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"type":"string"},"startdate":{"type":"integer"},"enddate":{"type":"integer"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"title":"GroupObjectBody"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Returns the created group's information, including membership details.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["entities"],"type":"object","properties":{"entities":{"type":"array","items":{"required":["category","path","title","uuid"],"type":"object","properties":{"uuid":{"type":"string"},"category":{"type":"string"},"title":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"},"group":{"required":["enddate","startdate"],"type":"object","properties":{"startdate":{"type":"integer"},"enddate":{"type":"integer"}},"title":"GroupInfo"}},"title":"GroupResponseBody"}},"cursor":{"type":"string"},"count":{"type":"integer"}},"title":"GroupAndMembershipSchema"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request. Check request body for errors.","content":{}},"401":{"description":"Invalid or missing Authorization token.","content":{}},"403":{"description":"User lacks the necessary permissions to create a group.","content":{}},"404":{"description":"Organization with the given 'orgid' not found.","content":{}},"425":{"description":"Provided access token has expired.","content":{}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
